meanings.sent1: The soldier felt vulnerable in his unarmored uniform.
meanings.sent2: The knight wore unarmored clothing for the peaceful ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The unarmored squirrel scampered across the yard, dodging imaginary foes.
meanings.sent4: Her unarmored heart was exposed, ready to be hurt by his words.
meanings.sent5: The unarmored car was no match for the harsh weather conditions.

meanings.sent1: The unarmored tank was easily penetrated by enemy fire.
meanings.sent2: The unarmored warrior relied on speed and agility in battle.
meanings.sent3: The unarmored robot danced around the room, showing off its shiny metal parts.
meanings.sent4: His unarmored emotions were raw and unguarded, open to the world.
meanings.sent5: The unarmored ship was at the mercy of the pirate's cannons.
